text: Ingmar Ott (born 14 September 1955) is an Estonian botanist from Tartu. In 1980, he graduated from the University of Tartu in biology. In 1984, he became affiliated with the Estonian Institute of Zoology and Botany. ==External links== *Estonian portal Category:Estonian botanists Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tartu Category:University of Tartu alumni Category:University of Tartu faculty Category:Estonian University of Life Sciences faculty
title: Ingmar Ott
